channel.title: Damn CRIA
channel.description:
Looks like they took demonoid down for good this time..
The CRIA threatened the company renting the servers to us, and because of this it is not possible to keep the site online. Sorry for the inconvenience and thanks for your understanding.

item.title: Damn CRIA
item.dc:creator: @sidishere sidishere
item.description:
@sidishere wrote:

end of a great site maybe they will take down isohunt aswell

Read full topic

item.title: Damn CRIA
item.dc:creator: @Hyjall Hyjall
item.description:
@Hyjall wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

There is nothing special about demonoid. The only thing that was cool about it was the commenting system, but torrentspy had it (it’s down for some reason) and mininova has it too. And I’m pretty sure there are more sites that have it.

Ofcourse they do, but alot of times people don’t use them. For example I had to look on the cache of google from demonoid to find installation instructions for a torrent on Mininova.

Read full topic

item.title: Damn CRIA
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“killerman93, post:20, topic:158015”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=215403.msg1879204#msg1879204 date=1194909269]
I’ve never gotten a fake torrent in my entire life, i thought they were only myths.
[/quote]

An example would be like when I tried to download Leopard. The torrents name was MAC.OSX.LEOPARD.ISO, so I downloaded it. And what was inside? leopard-11.dmg
So unfair.[/quote]

Haha, that is an image, just convert it to iso to burn it.

I have never gotten a ‘fake’ torrent either, I use thepiratebay.org

Read full topic

item.title: Damn CRIA

@Zach1188 wrote:

The only thing that set Demonoid aside was the community. Otherwise it’s no better than any other torrent site.

item.title: Damn CRIA
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

You don’t understand. We’re not stealing from the artists. We’re stealing from the record industry. If these artists got some sense and went the way of Radiohead, they’d be millionaires. As it stands, they’re retards who can’t tell a browser from a web page, and if they’re hurt in any way by our file-sharing, they deserve it.

Read full topic

item.title: Damn CRIA
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

No you would not, if it was your only source of income then you would not.

Read full topic

item.title: Damn CRIA
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:26, topic:158015”]Yeah, so say when your older you go into web design and you start selling website templates or some shit, people start taking them somehow and giving them around for free thus fucking your ‘business’ up.

Basically you want what people make and spend time on for them to sell and earn a living all for free? Even still i never said i was against torrenting and downloading music and shit because yes i do it, but i’m saying how the fuck can you complain? you don’t have a leg to stand on.[/quote]

That’s entirely different.

If I sold my rights to a company, and whatever they sold, I received a tiny insignificant fraction, no, I wouldn’t care if they stole my designs. That’s a compliment.

Read full topic

item.title: Damn CRIA
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

ThugLife:

Like i said i honestly don’t care if they loose money or not, what i’m talking about is you people complaining at the CRIA because they are trying to protect honest people’s careers from us robbing bastards.

i’m jsut saying, they’ll always be making money until the unintelligent honest minded people die off,

Read full topic

item.title: Damn CRIA
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:26, topic:158015”][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=215403.msg1879514#msg1879514 date=1194920863]

I’m not saying you should stop or anything i’m just saying, stop crying about it because in the end you are the ones in the wrong.

Yes you’re right. The music industry has an oligopoly and is ripping off ignorant people like you. I guess we’re wrong for standing up for ourselves and not taking their shit.
[/quote]
Yeah, so say when your older you go into web design and you start selling website templates or some shit, people start taking them somehow and giving them around for free thus fucking your ‘business’ up.

Basically you want what people make and spend time on for them to sell and earn a living all for free? Even still i never said i was against torrenting and downloading music and shit because yes i do it, but i’m saying how the fuck can you complain? you don’t have a leg to stand on.[/quote]
they can always make money from the people too afraid to torrent and shit.

Demonoid isn’t down for good

On irc, the title is “Site is down, tracker is up. Expect the site to return, unless we hear otherwise from Deimos” - deimos being the owner.

http://torrentfreak.com/demonoid-shuts-down-again-071109/
